article.title: A Survey of Machine Learning for Big Code and Naturalness

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the primary focus of the research surveyed in this article?
choices: The history of software engineering and programming languages.
The use of machine learning for analyzing and understanding source code.
The comparison of different programming languages.
The development of new formal methods for software development.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does this formula represent in the context of probabilistic models of code?
choices: The probability of a specific code sequence given its context.
The complexity of a given source code file.
The accuracy of a machine learning model on a specific task.
The number of tokens within a code sequence.

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Table 1, which type of model is most commonly used for code migration tasks?
What does the term H(c, PD) represent in the context of evaluating code language models?
choices: The average number of tokens within a code sequence.
The probability of a specific code sequence under the model.
The cross-entropy of a code sequence with respect to the probability distribution.
The perplexity of the model on a given code corpus.
